casebody.data:
John MOSBY
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION OF the CITY OF NORWALK Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 10, 2019

John Mosby, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 771, 203 A.3d 694 (2019), is denied.
